not-logged-in: You must be logged in to view this page
not-authorized: You are not authorized to view this content
password-security: For security, please enter your password to continue.

log-out.modal-body: Are you sure you want to log out of Testhub?

disable-account.modal-body: Are you sure you want to permanently disable your Testhub account?

account-recovery.title: Getting back into your Testhub account
account-recovery.subtitle: Tell us some information about your account.
account-recovery.label: Enter the email associated with your account to change your password.
account-recovery.confirm-body-sent-link: Please go to your {0} email and click the password reset link we've sent for your Testhub account.
account-recovery.confirm-body-check-spam: It could take a few minutes to appear, and be sure to check any spam and promotional foldersâ€”just in case!

password-reset.title: Set New Password
password-reset.subtitle: Set a new password for your account. Resetting your password will also invalidate any existing log in sessions.
password-reset.confirm-body: Your password has been reset successfully! You can now use your new password to log in to your account.

password-validation.label: Passwords must be 8 to 16 characters long and contain the following:

contains.1: At least one digit from 1 to 9 (including 0)
